title: The Boston Roast Session Late Show w/ DC Young Fly, Karlous Miller and Chico Bean
itunes:title: The Boston Roast Session Late Show w/ DC Young Fly, Karlous Miller and Chico Bean
description:
On this classic sold out show from Boston, Massachusetts - Karlous , DC and Chico turn up cuz the audience was turnt! The whole crowd gets roasted but they know how to handle it and get in on the fun. This was the second sold out show from The Wilbur Theater! The man with the half haircut, the owner of the building and everybody in the front row gets the roast! Plus Karlous and the crew get into a classic bits about Super Mario, Uno and a bunch of other random funny stuff! The band went stuuupid! This is the mufuffin late show show from Boston! This is the coldest podcast!


WATCH KARLOUS MILLER and CHICO BEAN'S DIRECT TO CONSUMER COMEDY SPECIAL #BUYANYMEANS

https://vimeo.com/ondemand/karlousmil...


Subscribe To our Channel: bitly.com/85tube

FOLLOW THE CREW


KARLOUS MILLER - https://www.facebook.com/karlousm/

DCYOUNGFLY - https://www.facebook.com/DcYoungFly1/

CHICO BEAN - https://www.facebook.com/OldSchoolFool/


Director - JOE T. NEWMAN - https://www.instagram.com/smokingjoen...

Producer CHAD OUBRE - https://www.instagram.com/chadoubre/

Producer - LANCE CRAYTON - https://www.instagram.com/cat_corleone_/

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
